titlestmt.titleproper: A Guide to the W. F. Massey Papers, 1893-1908, n.d.

frontmatter.titlepage:
W. F. Massey Papers, 1893-1908, n.d.
A Collection in
Special Collections Ms1984-171
Special Collections, Virginia Tech 2014 &contact;
Processed by: Ashley Wellens, Student Volunteer and Kira A. Dietz, Archivist,
Special Collections

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Tech, Blacksburg, Va.
did.abstract: The collection consists of copies of correspondence to Massey from farmers, horticultural societies, and others regarding articles in The Practical Farmer.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from W. F. Massey Papers must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: W. F. Massey Papers, Ms1984-171, Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The W. F. Massey Papers were acquired by Special Collections prior to 1984.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing, arrangement, and description of the W. F. Massey Papers was completed in 1984. Additional description was completed in April 2011.

bioghist.head: Biographical note
bioghist.p: W. F. Massey was a professor of Botany Arboriculture at the North Carolina College of Agriculture and Mechanics Arts, and editor of The Practical Farmer.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of copies of correspondence to Massey from farmers, horticultural societies, and others regarding articles in The Practical Farmer. Letters date from 1893 to 1908.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The collection is arranged chronologically, with undated materials at the end.
